question: Hello, Austin. This is Basil Exposition, Chief of British Intelligence.

And a factory in Chicago that makes miniature models of factories. We also own the Franklin mint, which makes decorative hand-painted theme plates for collectors. Some plates, like the Gone With The Wind series, have gone up in value as much as two-hundred and forty percent, but, as with any investment, there is some risk involved.

answer: It's about the sharks. Since you were frozen, they've been placed on the Endangered Species List. We tried to get some, but it will take months to clear up the red tape.

question: Right. Mr. Powers, we're going to lower you in a tank of piranhas with laser beams attached to their heads. What is it now?
answer: Well, we experimented with lasers, but you would be surprised at how heavy they are. They actually outweighed the piranha themselves, and the fish, well, they sank to the bottom and died.

question: I have one simple request&emdash; sharks with friggin' laser beams attached to their heads, and it can't be done? Remind me again why I pay you people?
answer: Sea bass.

question: Right.
answer: They're mutated sea bass.

question: Really? Are they ill-tempered?
answer: Please allow me to demonstrate.

question: Fine. Whatever. Mutated, ill- tempered sea bass it is. Come, let's return to dinner. Close the tank.
answer: Aren't you going to watch them? They'll get away!

question: No, we'll leave them alone and not actually witness them dying, and we'll just assume it all went to plan.
answer: I have a gun in my room. Give me five seconds, I'll come back and blow their brains out.

question: What's your plan?
answer: First, I plan to soil myself. Then, I plan to regroup and think about the next move. Any thoughts?

question: Sadly, no. Hold on! I always keep this on me just in case.
answer: All right, I get it. I have bad teeth. You have to understand, in Britain in the Sixties you could be a sex symbol and still have bad teeth. It didn't matter.

question: No, no, no. We'll use the floss to get to the ledge.
answer: Smashing idea! Give it to me. Judo chop!

question: Hold on, Vanessa!
answer: Austin, watch out!

question: Not a good time to lose one's head.
answer: Indeed.

question: That's not the way to get ahead in life.
answer: Yes.

question: It's a shame he wasn't more headstrong.
answer: Shut up.

question: What do we do now?
answer: We've got a freaked out square and world annihilation is his bag. You go get help. I'm gonna stay here and keep an eye on the bad Doctor.

question: I'm not going anywhere. We're a team.
answer: Too right, youth. That's why I need you to lead the troops.

question: I'll hurry back.
answer: Listen, Vanessa, whatever happens, I just want you to know that I feel bad about shagging that Italian girl. I had a sip of sake and all of the sudden, I don't know what happened. The whole time I was shagging her&emdash; I mean really shagging her, I mean it was crazy, I was like a huge mechanical piston, in and out, IN and OUT!&emdash;

question: Austin, what's your point?
answer: Anyways, what I'm trying to say is that if you want me to be a one-woman man, well, that's just groovy, because...I love you.

question: Come, everyone, let us repair to the main chamber. Project Vulcan is about to begin. Scott, are you coming?
answer: I don't want to.

question: Don't you want to see what Daddy does for a living?
answer: Blow me.

question: What did you say?
answer: Show me.

question: Hello, hello. No, actually, I have to save the world. Is it cold in here?
answer: Arm the probe!

question: I've got to get Dr. Evil! Margaret Thatcher naked on a cold day! Margaret Thatcher naked on a cold day! Margaret Thatcher naked on a cold day!
answer: Probe in place. Five minutes to go. Let the penetration countdown begin.

question: Au contraire, I think you can't resist me. It's not what it looks like, Vanessa. At ease, boys.
answer: Likewise.

question: I can explain. They attacked me. Gas came out of her...well, and then they...and I...
answer: I believe you, Austin. Let's go.

question: Follow me! We're going to have to jump over the rail!
answer: Are you crazy?

question: Don't worry! Blast! Out of ammo.
answer: Austin, I'm coming with you.

question: I'm going it alone this time, Vanessa. I have a follow-up visit with the Evil Doctor.
answer: I'll secure the perimeter.

question: Good afternoon, Mr. Powers, I'm the Destructacon 5000. I'm programmed to prevent you from progressing beyond this point. You might as well surrender. Resistance is futile. Your odds of survival are 23,763,273 to
answer: Well, Destructacon 5000, you have quite a head on your shoulders, I dare to coin.

question: Yes, I am programmed to answer any question.
answer: Really? Let me ask you this. What is love?

question: That does not compute.
answer: Why not? It's a question.

question: Subterranean detonation&emdash; one minute and COUN-ting.
answer: Where's the abort button? Ow! That really hurt. I'm going to have a lump there, you idiot! Who throws a shoe? You fight like a woman.

question: Fifteen seconds and COUN-ting.
answer: Care for a drink? Shocking.

question: Three...two...one...
answer: Nooooooo!

question: I've got you, Dr. Evil!
answer: Well done, Mr. Powers. We're not so different, you and I. It's true, you're British, and I'm Belgian. You have a full head of hair, mine is slightly receding. You're thin, I'm about forty pounds overweight. OK, we are different, I'm not making a very good point. However, isn't it ironic, Mr. Powers, that the very things you stand for&emdash; swinging, free love, parties, distrust of authority- are all now, in the Nineties, considered to

question: No, man, what we swingers were rebelling against were uptight squares like you, whose bag was money and world domination. We were innocent, man. If we'd known the consequences of our sexual liberation, we would have done things differently, but the spirit would have remained the same. It's freedom, man.
answer: Your freedom has cause more pain and suffering in the world than any plan I ever dreamed of. Face it, freedom failed.

question: That's why right now is a very groovy time, man. We still have freedom, but we also have responsibility.
answer: Really, there's nothing more pathetic than an aging hipster.

question: This is for sleeping with my man, you whore!
answer: I didn't sleep with him.

question: I don't believe you.
answer: It's the teeth.

question: I have something to tell you.
answer: Lay it on me.

question: I love you, Austin.
answer: That's fab, because I love you, too, Vanessa.

question: Kiss me.
answer: Behave! Just when things were getting interesting.
